sentences.sentence: Undoubtedly the grimmest part of him was his iron claw.
sentences.translation: 毫无疑问，他身上最可怕的部分是他的铁爪。

sentences.sentence: Growth prospects look grimmest in Europe.
sentences.translation: 欧洲的增长前景最为黯淡。

sentences.sentence: The firefighter survivors all wore the grimmest pride on their faces.
sentences.translation: 活着归来的消防员脸上都带着极为严肃的自豪。
